mapper.select: SELECT a.id one_id,a.pname one_name , b.id two_id,b.pname two_name, c.`id` three_id,c.`pname` three_name FROM teachplan a LEFT JOIN teachplan b ON a.id = b.`parentid` LEFT JOIN teachplan c ON c.`parentid` = b.`id` WHERE a.`parentid`=0 AND a.`courseid`=#{id} ORDER BY a.`orderby`,b.`orderby`,c.`orderby`;
